an3.118:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti … pe …
an3.118:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco abhijjhālu hoti byāpannacitto.
an3.118:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti viparītadassano:
an3.118:7.4: ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
an3.118:7.7: diṭṭhivipattihetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
an3.118:7.8: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, apaṇṇako maṇi uddhaṃ khitto yena yeneva patiṭṭhāti suppatiṭṭhitaṃyeva patiṭṭhāti;
an3.118:7.9: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sīlavipattihetu vā sattā … pe …
an3.118:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti … pe …
an3.118:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anabhijjhālu hoti abyāpannacitto.
an3.118:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti aviparītadassano:
an3.118:11.4: ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti.
an3.118:11.6: Sīlasampadāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
an3.118:11.8: diṭṭhisampadāhetu vā, bhikkhave, sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
an3.118:11.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, apaṇṇako maṇi uddhaṃ khitto yena yeneva patiṭṭhāti suppatiṭṭhitaṃyeva patiṭṭhāti;
an3.118:11.10: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sīlasampadāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti, cittasampadāhetu vā sattā … pe …
an3.118:11.11: diṭṭhisampadāhetu vā sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
